Baked Lemon Pudding

Baked Lemon Pudding

serves 4 to 6

#####

Leek Soup

1 leek

Slice the white and pale green portions of the leek paper-thin and chop the slices into small pieces. Fry the pieces gently in butter until soft.

25 ml butter
